mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rules (result_fact, model_id, expression_id) VALUES(#{result_fact}, #{model_id}, #{expression_id})
mapper.select: SELECT rules.id, result_fact, expressions.id as expression_id, parent_id, fact, type_expression FROM rules join model on rules.model_id=model.id join expressions on (expressions.id = rules.expression_id) join type_of_expression on ( type_of_expression.id = type_id) where model.name = #{name}
